ComicInfo.Summary:
The team is down, Zealot is gravely injured, and the Huntsman is doing all he can to keep her and his charge, Miranda, one step ahead of the pursuing Troika. Luckily, the calvary has arrived in the form of the Soldier, Savant, Grifter, and the super powerful Mister Majestic!
Zealot has been poisoned by the claw of an alien that is slowly turning her into the same kind of alien and Huntsman, with his ward Miranda Tai, travels with her when they are greeted by Troika, three powerful super-villains. Meanwhile, Tapestry has taken control of the rest of the WildC.A.T.s, making them her loyal servants. The only one to fight against it is Voodoo, who was actually possessed by an alien force. She is soon found by employees of Lord Emp. While Huntsman deals with Troika on his own, Zealot's reinforcements arrive in the form of Soldier, Mister Majestic and her younger sister, Savant. They defeat Troika and prepare to fight against Tapestry and their possessed teammates.
ComicInfo.Title: A Gathering of Eagles
